The most prestigious film awards starts in:

A24

For the 2025 Oscars, A24 has several films generating buzz. One of the standout contenders is "Sing Sing," which stars Colman Domingo. Given A24's strong track record in recent years, the studio is expected to push hard for this film during awards season​

Netflix

Netflix is looking strong for the 2025 Oscars with several highly anticipated films. Netflix has been steadily increasing its presence at the Oscars, and with these strong contenders, it looks poised to make a significant impact at the 2025 ceremony.

Paul Mescal

Paul Mescal is a strong contender for the 2025 Best Actor Oscar for his performance in "A Complete Unknown," where he plays a young Bob Dylan. This role is significant as it showcases his versatility and depth as an actor, building on his previous acclaim. Mescal's portrayal of Dylan in this biographical drama has been praised for its authenticity and emotional intensity, making him a standout in the awards race​.

Amy Adams

Amy Adams is generating significant Oscar buzz for her role in "Nightbitch." In this film, she portrays a stay-at-home mother who believes she is turning into a dog. This dark comedy-drama allows Adams to delve into themes of motherhood, identity, and transformation, showcasing her range and depth as an actress.
